snippet.title: [Soulestination] Meta-element strategy game!
snippet.description:
Hi guys! This is the first time that I release a game on steam. It is a "magic tower" game (a kind of strategy RPG) that owns 10+ playtime!
The steam link is https://store.steampowered.com/app/1477330. It is planned to be released on Jan.6th, 2021. Hope you will like it!
